laser beats Ghost

A board game which can help students learn knowledge of reflection of light better.This game works like this:

One player(we call that player:player1) can put different chesses which can reflect laser in different position in limited time.But he need to make sure that the laser can beat on the ghost(a chess which represents ghost)through a hole.

Another player(we call that player:player2) need to find out through which hole the laser light can beat on the ghost.He needs to find out that hole in the limited time.And the times he can use the laser to try which hole works is also limited.If he can not find that holes as requirement,then player1 will win this round.His score will be added one point.

After this round,player1 and play2 will switch their roles,repeat previous steps.The competition will last 30 rounds.The player who has higher scores will win this competition.
